subcategory.name: Comboboxes
subcategory.description: Combobox examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS combobox components to provide a combination of input fields and dropdown menus for things like autocomplete search bars, country selection, and filtering options. These combobox components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.

rel="modulepreload" href="/plus-assets/build/assets/iframe-BUCe_xEG.js" /><script type="module" src="/plus-assets/build/assets/iframe-BUCe_xEG.js"></script>
<script>
     window.addEventListener('load', () => window.setTimeout(() => {
        const makeLink = (asset) => {
            const link = document.createElement('link')

            Object.keys(asset).forEach((attribute) => {
                link.setAttribute(attribute, asset[attribute])
            })

            return link
        }

        const loadNext = (assets, count) => window.setTimeout(() => {
            if (count > assets.length) {
                count = assets.length

                if (count === 0) {
                    return
                }
            }

            const fragment = new DocumentFragment

            while (count > 0) {
                const link = makeLink(assets.shift())
                fragment.append(link)
                count--

                if (assets.length) {
                    link.onload = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                    link.onerror = () => loadNext(assets, 1)
                }
            }

            document.head.append(fragment)
        })

        loadNext([], 3)
    }))
</script><style>body { -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; background-color: oklch(21% 0.034 264.665); }</style><body><div style="min-height: 450px" class="flex justify-center bg-gray-900 p-8 scheme-dark">
  <div class="mx-auto w-full max-w-xs">
    <label for="autocomplete" class="block text-sm/6 font-medium text-white">Assigned to</label>
    <el-autocomplete class="relative mt-2 block">
      <input id="autocomplete" type="text" class="block w-full rounded-md bg-white/5 py-1.5 pr-12 pl-3 text-base text-white outline-1 -outline-offset-1 outline-white/10 placeholder:text-gray-500 focus:outline-2 focus:-outline-offset-2 focus:outline-indigo-500 sm:text-sm/6" />
      <button type="button" class="absolute inset-y-0 right-0 flex items-center rounded-r-md px-2">
        <svg viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="currentColor" data-slot="icon" aria-hidden="true" class="size-5 text-gray-400">
          <path d="M5.22 8.22a.75.75 0 0 1 1.06 0L10 11.94l3.72-3.72a.75.75 0 1 1 1.06 1.06l-4.25 4.25a.75.75 0 0 1-1.06 0L5.22 9.28a.75.75 0 0 1 0-1.06Z" clip-rule="evenodd" fill-rule="evenodd" />
        </svg>
      </button>

      <el-options anchor="bottom end" popover data-initial-popover-open class="max-h-60 w-(--input-width) overflow-auto rounded-md bg-gray-800 py-1 text-base outline -outline-offset-1 outline-white/10 transition-discrete [--anchor-gap:--spacing(1)] data-leave:transition data-leave:duration-100 data-leave:ease-in data-closed:data-leave:opacity-0 sm:text-sm">
        <el-option value="Leslie Alexander" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Leslie Alexander</el-option>
        <el-option value="Michael Foster" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Michael Foster</el-option>
        <el-option value="Dries Vincent" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Dries Vincent</el-option>
        <el-option value="Lindsay Walton" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Lindsay Walton</el-option>
        <el-option value="Courtney Henry" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Courtney Henry</el-option>
        <el-option value="Tom Cook" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Tom Cook</el-option>
        <el-option value="Whitney Francis" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Whitney Francis</el-option>
        <el-option value="Leonard Krasner" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Leonard Krasner</el-option>
        <el-option value="Floyd Miles" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Floyd Miles</el-option>
        <el-option value="Emily Selman" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Emily Selman</el-option>
        <el-option value="Kristin Watson" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Kristin Watson</el-option>
        <el-option value="Emma Dorsey" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Emma Dorsey</el-option>
        <el-option value="Alicia Bell" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Alicia Bell</el-option>
        <el-option value="Jenny Wilson" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Jenny Wilson</el-option>
        <el-option value="Anna Roberts" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Anna Roberts</el-option>
        <el-option value="Benjamin Russel" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Benjamin Russel</el-option>
        <el-option value="Jeffrey Webb" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Jeffrey Webb</el-option>
        <el-option value="Kathryn Murphy" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Kathryn Murphy</el-option>
        <el-option value="Lawrence Hunter" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Lawrence Hunter</el-option>
        <el-option value="Yvette Armstrong" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Yvette Armstrong</el-option>

        <el-option value="Blake Reid" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Blake Reid</el-option>
        <el-option value="Hector Gibbons" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Hector Gibbons</el-option>
        <el-option value="Fabricio Mendes" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Fabricio Mendes</el-option>

        <el-option value="Chelsea Hagon" class="block truncate px-3 py-2 text-gray-300 select-none aria-selected:bg-indigo-500 aria-selected:text-white">Chelsea Hagon</el-option>
      </el-options>
    </el-autocomplete>
  </div>
</div>
<script>
  {
    function onReady() {
      let popovers = document.querySelectorAll('[popover][data-initial-popover-open]')
      popovers.forEach((popover) => popover.showPopover())
    }
    if (customElements.get('el-popover')) {
      onReady()
    } else {
      window.addEventListener('elements:ready', () => onReady())
    }
  }
</script>
</body>

<el-autocomplete class="relative mt-2 block">
  <input id="autocomplete" type="text" class="block w-full rounded-md bg-white/5 py-1.5 pr-12 pl-3 text-base text-white outline-1 -outline-offset-1 outline-white/10 placeholder:text-gray-500 focus:outline-2 focus:-outline-offset-2 focus:outline-indigo-500 sm:text-sm/6" />
